name: Mdc.Select

aliases.name: Data
aliases.type: { items : List.List item, opened : Basics.Bool, selected : item }

aliases.name: Msgs
aliases.type: { close : msg, select : item -> msg, toggle : msg }

values.name: view
values.type: Mdc.Select.Data item -> Mdc.Select.Msgs item msg -> (item -> String.String) -> Html.Html msg
